qDBMSName.desc: Name of the product accessed by the provider

qDBUsage.desc: If set to true, it means that the data source contains some databases.

qOwnerUsage.desc: If set to true, it means that the data source contains some owners.

qDBSeparator.desc:
Character string used after the database name
Example with separator ".":
FROM LinkedTablesData.dbo.Months
Where:

LinkedTablesData is the database name
dbo is the owner name
Months is the table name

qOwnerSeparator.desc:
Character string used after the owner name
Example with separator ".":
FROM LinkedTablesData.dbo.Months
Where:

LinkedTablesData is the database name
dbo is the owner name
Months is the table name

qDBFirst.desc: If set to true, it means that the database is displayed first, before the owners and tables.

qQuotePreffix.desc: Prefix used with field, database or owner names that contain special characters or keywords.

qQuoteSuffix.desc: Suffix used with field, database or owner names that contain special characters or keywords.
